enhanced_description: Ripple Hire, launched in 2012, is an award-winning (11 Brandon Hall awards in 4 years) talent acquisition cloud (TA Cloud) platform designed to make recruiting effortless, human, and delightful. It has served over 1 million users across 50+ countries and is a proven go-to platform in over 45+ countries. The intelligent end-to-end ATS (Applicant Tracking System) supports efficient hiring and delivers best-in-class experiences for both recruiters (4.5/5 satisfaction) and candidates (4.7/5 satisfaction). Ripple Hire is recognized for its innovation and effectiveness in the talent acquisition space, notably as a market leader in referral technology. Its enterprise platform helps customers build a powerful hiring engine that contributes to top-line growth by improving retention, enabling remote talent sourcing, and facilitating the hiring of quality talent. It is designed to be simple to use and powerful to govern, catering to small, large, and global enterprise companies, also supporting job boards and onboarding processes.
